projects.title: Blood Bank management
projects.description: Made an app named "U Donor" which connects the blood donor and borrower to the blood banks nearby.The donor can find the nearby blood banks and find the shortest route to it. The blood banks can see blood stats and blood donors.

projects.title: Artist Database
projects.description: The app is used to store the info about the artist and associated albums. You can create and store the artist and albums and also modify them. The database is stored in Google firebase.

projects.title: Covid chatbot
projects.description: • Developed the back-end for the chatbot in NodeJs• Created and maintained the database in MongoDB• Woked on the overall lifecycle from development, logging, alerts to deployment

projects.title: Realtime chat-application
projects.description: • Developed real-time messaging webapp similar to Slack.• Features include new DM, edit/delete message, delivered/read status, online/offline status, attachment support.• Tech Stack: Express, React, Socket.io

projects.title: Student MIS
projects.description: • Developed a full-stack application for managing student/teacher onboarding, course registration and regular classes.• Designed the frontend using react.• Coded the backend on Express using typescript.• Developed a model using TensorFlow to recognise the faces of all students in a classroom for touchless attendance.

projects.title: Cats vs Dogs classifier app
projects.description: An application that classifies an image as a dog or cat with a self trained embedded model.Used a tflite model trained by me using Keras

projects.title: Identification of Deep Fakes using advanced deep learning
projects.description: A deepfake detection network pipeline to detect videos with facial manipulation.An RNN was trained to capture temporal and intra-frame inconsistencies.

projects.title: LiquIVics
projects.description: An IOT based smart bottle holder for automatic fluid flow regulation (in drips).A mobile application for easy control of the hardware.

projects.title: Early warning system for ADR
projects.description: A web application for doctors to get information regarding the probability of Adverse Drug Reactions associated with the drugs to be prescribed to patients.

projects.title: Home automation
projects.description: Controls the home appliances remotely using firebase, a raspberry pie at home and a simple app.

projects.title: Millet disease detection
projects.description: The api consists a post request end-point to accept an image and detect the millet's disease in the image. Developed using Django_rest.The front-end part of the app is at https://github.com/pratikg1999/millet_app

projects.title: Android app to ask and answer question in video format for individual and institute
projects.description: Made the UI and functionalities of the front end using flutter.Made a Rest API using Spring Boot to support the overall working.

projects.title: Digital Outpass
projects.description: Digitizes the process of getting an out pass, thus eliminating the tedious process of getting a paper outpass.Made using Android Studio and Firebase.

projects.title: Image segmentation using watershed in Matlab
projects.description: This is a program that segments the image using watershed technique thus separating the objects in the image. Further it can be used to count the number of objects in the image.

projects.title: Vehicle Detection
projects.description: The system counts the number of vehicles arriving and leaving through a line(Gate) with the help of a camera. The recognition and counting of vehicles are achieved using OpenCV and python.

projects.title: Air Mouse
projects.description: Air Mouse is designed to lessen the inconveniencecaused to the computer user, who must switch back andforth to use both the keyboard and mouse. Whenever theuser must move the cursor, he will simply press a buttonthat is already fixed to the glove, worn on the hand andpoint his finger at the screen and move it. Air mouse iscomfortable to wear and does not significantly inhibittyping. It functions completely as a two-button serialmouse.

honors_and_awards.description: • Ranked 328th out of 2265 teams in the private leaderboard of the Kaggle competition.

honors_and_awards.title: Genpact Dare in Reality hackathon winner
honors_and_awards.description: • Developed a self-learning, early warning system for adverse drug reaction (ADR) and won 1st prize - INR 3 lakhs. • The web application can be used by healthcare professionals all over the world to get information regarding the probability of ADR associated with the drugs they would prescribe their patients. • It was an ideation and development challenge for start-ups, students, and digital enthusiasts. • Participants had to come up with disruptive solutions to common global business… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Hult Prize Bangkok Regionals 2020 qualifier
honors_and_awards.description: • Qualified and participated in the Hult Prize regionals Bangkok 2020. • Our theme: Saving environment by reducing air pollution.

honors_and_awards.title: Chief Minister Academic Scholarship Recipient
honors_and_awards.description: • Awarded academic scholarship by State Govt. for my excellent academic performance. • The tuition fee of INR 90,000 per year waived off for three consecutive years of my B.Tech.
